channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- CloudForms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- CloudForms

item.title: CVE-2019-10177|2024-08-04T22:10:10.027Z -- red%20hat -- cloudforms
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability was found in the PDF export component of CloudForms, versions 5.9 and 5.10, due to user input is not properly sanitized. An attacker with least privilege to edit compute is able to execute a XSS attack against other users, which could lead to malicious code execution and extraction of the anti-CSRF token of higher privileged users.
